title: NMPT Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Deputy Chief Engineer Posts
description: New Mangalore Port Trust (NMPT) has announced the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Deputy Chief Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NMPT Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online on or before the last date of ap...
